author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Watch: Daniel Craig puts reporter firmly back in her box after she orders him to 'pout'
text:
Ah, ITV's Sarah Powell is simply trying to get a bit of personality to her interview. All she (really) wanted was to make Bond pout for get a killer vine, instead she got one killer soundbite... You can almost hear Powell's heart drop out of her bottom when Craig mumbles "I think you need to move on."
Reports suggest that the interview only went downhill from there, with Us Weekly stating: "Powell also mentioned that Craig’s character seems more modest in the latest 007 installment. 'Has James Bond gone shy?' she asked, referring to Craig’s lack of nudity in the film. 'He’s going shy now,' the actor quipped'."
MORE: Daniel Craig says he's NOT done with James Bond just yet
MORE: Watch: The final promo for Spectre drops and it looks phenomenal
MORE: Daniel Craig says he'd rather self-harm than do another Bond movie
